S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3002

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 21, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. PERRY -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN ACT to amend chapter 586 of the laws  of  2002  amending  the  public
         authorities  law  relating  to  creating  an age limitation for police
         candidates for the police department of the  metropolitan  transporta-
         tion authority, in relation to the effectiveness thereof

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 2 of chapter 586 of the laws of 2002  amending  the
    2  public authorities law relating to creating an age limitation for police
    3  candidates  for the police department of the metropolitan transportation
    4  authority, is amended to read as follows:
    5    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately, PROVIDED,  HOWEVER,  THAT
    6  NO  AGE  RESTRICTION  FIRST IMPOSED BY THE AMENDMENT TO SUBDIVISION 2 OF
    7  SECTION 1266-H OF THE PUBLIC AUTHORITIES LAW MADE BY SECTION ONE OF THIS
    8  ACT SHALL APPLY TO ANY APPLICANT FOR APPOINTMENT TO THE AUTHORITY POLICE
    9  FORCE WHO HAS TAKEN AND PASSED THE WRITTEN EXAMINATION  TO  BE  ELIGIBLE
   10  FOR SUCH APPOINTMENT PRIOR TO THE EFFECTIVE DATE OF THIS ACT.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02620-01-1
